title: Streaming text display (incremental render)
description: Critical UX gap: agent text is invisible during generation. Every competitor shows tokens live. Design in tui-v2.md Q4. Buffer TextDelta in managed area, differential render, commit to scrollback on Finished. Needs BeginSynchronizedUpdate for flicker prevention. Sprint 15 item 12.

logs.msg: Implemented streaming text display. Incremental rendering via streaming_lines_rendered counter in RenderState. Holds back last 2 lines (wrapping/markdown safety). Handles tool-call interruption and finish with duplicate prevention.
